PUBLIC SCREENINGS
Each week, 4 movies in theaters (2D and 3D) every evening at 9 p.m CET.

60+ PREMIUM MOVIES ON DEMAND
Explore the largest catalog of movies on demand in virtual reality! +60 movies are available in 2D and 3D, most of them in several languages and with subtitles.

AMAZING IMAGE QUALITY AND SPATIALIZED AUDIO
Movies on demand are encoded by us in 1080p with a very high bitrate to offer the best image quality in VR.
All our environments surround you with spatialized 360° sound.

SOCIAL AND CROSS PLATFORM
Create or join private/public rooms to watch movies and videos with up to 9 people regardless of your VR headset.
Send emojis and chat to interact with your friends and other people.

LOCAL VIDEOS
Play videos from your computer or your home network (SMB). Audio tracks and subtitles are automatically recognized by our player.

THEMATIC SCENES
Personalize your experience with our 6 thematic scenes (movie theater, beach, drive-in, haunted house, spaceship and antic theater).

CINEVR 3.1.3 is here ! We added events and animations in sceneries and fixed some bugs in the movie player. Improvements : - Sceneries : Added sceneries events, animations and audios that increase the immersive feeling. ( Beach, Spaceship and Mansion ) - Movie Player : Added .srt/.sub support for subtitles on Exoplayer. The subs file should be named as same as the video file and should be given along with it in order to be opened. - Avatars : Added a new pinch gesture that matches to Oculus gestures guidelines. Fixes : - Movie Player : Fixed embed subtitles in video for Exoplayer. - Sceneries : Fixed white screen when arriving in a scenery. - Sceneries : Fixed lighting quality in beach and mansion sceneries. - Audios : Fixed all sceneries audios sources can be muted in audio panel. - UI : Some fixes...

CINEVR 3.1.2 is here ! We added events and animations in sceneries and fixed some bugs in the movie player.

Improvements :

    - Movie Player : Added .srt/.sub support for subtitles on Exoplayer. The subs file should be named as same as the video file and should be given along with it in order to be opened.
    - Avatars : Added a new pinch gesture that matches to Oculus gestures guidelines.
    
Fixes :
    - Movie Player : Fixed embed subtitles in video for Exoplayer.
    - Sceneries : Fixed white screen when arriving in a scenery.
    - Sceneries : Fixed lighting quality in beach and mansion sceneries.
    - Audios : Fixed all sceneries audios sources can be muted in audio panel.
    - UI : Some fixes...

Brace yourselves, CINEVR v3.1 is here! Make sure you update the app to upgrade the existing purchased scenes. 

What's changed : 
- VOD premium content! Using your popcorns, it is now possible to rent videos. Available at launch, The South Pole Explorer, a documentary from Targo Studios and Ushuaia TV, and lots of new content will be progressively added very soon! 
- A new spaceship 3D environment is available for purchase, a perfect place for your Sci-Fi and Space operas content Various fixes and improvements on existing premium environments (drive-in, beach, mansion...). 
- Fixed error messages with assets on Samsung devices
- Fixed an ugly player crash after a few minutes 
- Fixed a Skybox glitch during transition between popcorn selection and native store 
- Fixed the seat arrows that sometimes remain lit when hovering with laser pointer 
- Big codebase revamp that lays the groundwork for a major version coming soon 
- Upgraded engine to Unity 2018.4

- Fixed regression on audio spatialization
- Fixed seat positioning issue. Some users using 3.0.0 may still overlap, this will disappear as soon as apps are updated everywhere.
- Fixed aspect ratio on 3D Side-by-Side local videos

We are delighted to announce CINEVR v3.0 with a lot of new features and improvements!

• "Void", a customized player (size, position) to watch content alone,
• 3 new premium sceneries : "Beach", "Drive-in", and "Haunted house"
• New cross-platform account system to register with an email and a password,
• Local file explorer now supports SMB network shares
• New environment selection UI
• Improved rendering performance and increased eye resolution texture for sharper graphics
• Improved voice volume: users can be muted per-person, and voice is now correctly muted with volume set at zero

App will keep being improved further this year. Meanwhile, feel free to contact us on Reddit, Twitter, Facebook and email to tell us what you think!

Cheers,
the CINEVR team

Hello CINEVR community,

We’re thrilled to introduce our next generation of avatars!

- Brand new looks for avatars in the movie theater
- More realistic interactions and gestures
- New hands for both mobile and PC users

Our team is working hard on the next release and lots of new features are coming before the end of the year. Stay tuned! You can follow us on Twitter @Cinemur. Thanks a lot for all your support.

The CINEVR Team

Hello everyone,
 
We are happy to announce the availability of CINEVR 2.3 on GearVR and Oculus Go headsets. This new version introduces cool new features :
 
- Brand new file explorer with favorite folders
- New video player UI and controls
- Audio tracks and subtitles
- New 3D settings options
- Various bug fixes and fine tuning
 
Thank you for your patience. Our roadmap is exciting, and the next big release is planned for July. Stay tuned!
 
The CINEVR team

Dear users,

Introducing live movie screenings with CINEVR!

Sony Pictures and CINEVR team up for the world first movie screening event inside a virtual movie theater only 4 months after the theatrical release!

Jumanji: Welcome To The Jungle will play live inside CINEVR in 3D HD!

This 1st screening event will be available from France on Wednesday April, 25 2018 starting at 9 PM (Paris time UTC+2). More screenings to come in the coming weeks.

To attend the event from France, please visit https://cinevr.io/jumanji3D

We're looking forward to seeing you in VR for this world premiere!
Thanks!

The CINEVR team
Made with love in Paris.
